articles.title: Work of Kim Jong Il Published in Mexico
articles.content:
Work of Kim Jong Il Published in Mexico 
    Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's famous work "The Present Times and the Tasks Facing Young People" was published in pamphlet by the Mexican Workers' Party Publishing House on October 3.
 The pamphlet said in its preface that the famous work of  Kim Jong Il was published on the occasion of the 58th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.    
 The work was made public on October 12, Juche 77 (1988).

Floral Basket Laid before Statue of Kim Il Sung
articles.content:
Floral Basket Laid before Statue of Kim Il Sung 
    Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of different embassies in Pyongyang Tuesday laid a floral basket before the Statue of President Kim Il Sung on Mansu Hill on the occasion of the 58th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
 They laid the basket before his statue and paid highest tribute to him.

Kim Yong Nam Greets Ugandan President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Ugandan President
    Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Ugandan President Yoweri Kaguta Museveni on Oct. 6 on the occasion of the 41st anniversary of its independence.
 The message wished the president greater success in his responsible work for national unity and prosperity of the country, expressing belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Pakistani Ambassador
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Pakistani Ambassador
    Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and conversed with Sultan Habib, Pakistani ambassador to the DPRK, who paid a farewell call on him, at the Mansudae Assembly Hall today.
 Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, was on hand.

articles.title: Floral Basket from CPC Central Committee
articles.content:
Floral Basket from CPC Central Committee
    Pyongyang, October 8 (KCNA) -- A floral basket was sent to the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea by the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China on the occasion of the 58th anniversary of the WPK.
 It was handed to an official concerned by Tian Baozhen, Chinese charge d' affaires ad interim in Pyongyang, today.
